job.title: Machine Learning Engineer/Python
job.description: Job DescriptionA financial company that originally began in the NYC area has expanded their operations to the West Coast, specifically Irvine, CA. Theyâre looking for a Mid-level Machine Learning Engineer. The company itself helps to provide personalized financial services and options to small businesses. They have created a unique technology platform that is also offered to clients along with their notable customer service.The candidate must have at least 2 years of experience in Machine Learning/Data Engineering. You will be an integral part of the team while working closely with the Director of Analytics as well as other members of the team. This candidate must be local to the Orange County area and unfortunately cannot provide sponsorship at this time.Required Skills & ExperienceBachelors degree in Statistics/Analytics/Computer Science or related fieldA minimum of 2 years of experienceLocal to OC/LA areaMost experience writing production/deployment code using R/PythonDevelop deep learning modelsDesired Skills & ExperienceExperience in classification, detection, segmentationMore than 2+ years of experienceWhat You Will Be DoingTech Breakdown50% Coding50% ModelingDaily Responsibilities70% Hands On30% Team CollaborationThe OfferCompetitive Salary: Up to $150K/year, DOEYou Will Receive The Following BenefitsMedical Insurance & Health Savings Account (HSA)401(k)Paid Sick Time LeavePre-tax Commuter BenefitApplicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a full-time basis now and in the futurePosted By: Niki Strutzel
